member.name: T:Syncfusion.GridConverterWpfAssembly
member.summary: This class holds the name of the Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.Grid assembly and provides a helper routine that helps with resolving types when loading a serialization stream and when the framework probes for assemblies by reflection.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.GridConverterWpfAssembly.Name
member.summary: The full name of this assembly without version information: "Syncfusion.Grid.Wpf"

member.name: F:Syncfusion.GridConverterWpfAssembly.Assembly
member.summary: A reference to the for the Grid assembly.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.GridConverterWpfAssembly.RootNamespace
member.summary: The root namespace of this assembly. Used internally for locating resources within the assembly.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.GridConverterWpfAssembly.AssemblyResolver(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: This delegate helps with resolving types and can be used as a eventhandler for a event.
member.param: The event data with information about the type.
member.returns: A reference to the assembly where the type is located.
member.remarks: Use this handler when reading back types from a serialization stread saved with an earlier version of this assembly.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.Grid.Converter.GridModelImportExtensions.SkipMergeCellCheckOnSetBorders
member.summary:
After v6.1 ExcelToGrid Convertion will check for Merged cells when importing borders. When there is no merged cells this can be set to true to avoid cehcking for MergeCells on importing borders from exccel cells.
Default value is false.
